DOC.brief_summary: To test the effectiveness of a motivational intervention compared with standard patient education in improving economic and clinical outcomes in patients enrolled in an existing heart failure (HF) disease management program.
DOC.criteria: Chronic heart failure, hospitalized for heart failure or hospitalized for heart failure within the past 30 days, speak and read English Severe renal failure requiring dialysis, HIVAIDS, psychosis, uncorrected hearing loss
